title: Quote Generator
description: Quote Generator is a web app that generates random quotes via an API and allows sharing on ùïè (formerly Twitter).

title: Infinite Scroll
description: Infinite Scroll is a web app that fetches random images via an API.

title: Joke Teller
description: This joke teller app fetches jokes from JokeAPI and reads them aloud using ResponsiveVoice API.

title: Picture in Picture
description: Picture in Picture lets you watch videos in a floating window while using other apps or sites. It uses the Screen Capture API to capture your screen and the Picture in Picture API to display the video.

title: Light & Dark Mode
description: This light and dark mode switcher uses the localStorage API to save your preference.
